Types
ELogType
internal enum ELogType : byte

Log types used by the Logger.

VEvil.​Core.​Logger
public static
VEvil.​Core.​Logger

Wrapper for stylizing the Debug log calls provided by Unity and allow to save them in a file at runtime.

The following preprocessor definitions must be active such as "LOGGER_ENABLE" to authorize log calls and "LOGGER_ENABLE_FILE" to authorize runtime logging on a file.

Constants
TRACE_COLOR
private const string TRACE_COLOR

The color of the trace Debug.Log messages.

WARNING_COLOR
private const string WARNING_COLOR

The color of the trace Debug.LogWarning messages.

ERROR_COLOR
private const string ERROR_COLOR

The color of the trace Debug.LogError messages.

Variables
logWriter
private static StreamWriter logWriter

The StreamWriter of the log file.

logFileStream
private static FileStream logFileStream

The FileStream of the log file.

canWriteLog
private static bool canWriteLog

Is the Logger able to write log files.
